data.name: ECOMM - Kailo - [US] - CPA
data.description: Allowed Country: USA Creative: use your own

data.name: ECOMM - Kailo - [US] - RevShare - Email
data.description:
***Offer description*** Available Countries, Translated LP’s and more: http://bit.ly/2Sk36hR LP Customization info: https://goo.gl/hT3JYs GiddyUp Offer Updates: https://partnerupdates.giddyup.io/ Canto Album: https://giddyup.canto.com/v/partners/album/UI5VG?from=curatedView&scrollTo=433&gOrderProp=uploadDate&gSortingForward=false&display=curatedView&viewIndex=0
***Restrictions*** NO BIDDING ON THE FOLLOWING BRANDED TERMS (Including Shopping Ads):
1) Relevant Branded terms (e.g. Kailo)
Variations of the Branded Terms (i.e.: variations of branded terms examples (e.g. kailo, kailo pain patch, kailo adhesive, kailo pain relief, etc.) are also NOT ALLOWED.
No building branded FB pages that compete directly with the advertiser. ie - A branded FB page that uses the advertisers name
No use of the advertiser's brand name in URL (e.g. www.kailoreviews.com , www.kailofans.com , etc.)
No GI email allowed. Only email traffic to TOP LEVEL and cable domains is allowed (e.g. Gmail, Yahoo, Cox, Time Warner, etc.)
NO brokering to any networks is allowed
**COMPLIANCE GUIDELINES** Do not use or reference the name nCAP in any advertising or marketing materials. Do not use or reference the name nCAP Signal Leaf in any advertising or marketing materials. Do not claim that Kailo cures any ailments. Do not compare the efficacy of Kailo to any other pain relief products by name. Do not claim that the military developed Kailo patches with nano-technology for the sole purpose of relieving pain. The brand has called Kailo "A modern solution for pain relief," or "A High-tech solution for pain." You can discuss that Kailo is meant for pain and that there have been thousands of people who have felt relief using Kailo. The brand is in the process of obtaining FDA and CE certifications, do not mention they currently have it. You can mention that Kailo has been trialed by multiple doctors.

ECOMM - New Ultra WiFi Pro - Advanced WiFi Booster 50% OFF - [US/CA] - Email - (Proof RQD)
data.description:
The Best WiFi Signal Solution for the Pandemic.
Ultra WiFi Pro and it’s an extremely powerful WiFi Booster allow you to access two channels at once creating a ‘super-network.’
Designed to relay and boost your wireless internet connection instantly to reach all corners of your home without sacrificing connectivity or speed. No more lags, dropouts, or disconnections!
Its compact design keeps it out of sight while housing state of the art technology to boost your WiFi strength and extend the signal.
Pay on valid one-time purchase.

data.name: ECOMM - SleepConnection Store LCTC - [All Geo] - CPA - Email
ECOMM - smartDOT - [US] - RevShare - Email
data.description:
***Offer description*** Available Countries, Translated LP’s and more: http://bit.ly/2Sk36hR LP Customization info: https://goo.gl/hT3JYs GiddyUp Offer Updates: https://partnerupdates.giddyup.io/ Canto Album: https://giddyup.canto.com/v/partners/album/L0EVD?display=curatedView&viewIndex=0&gSortingForward&gOrderProp=name
***Restrictions*** NO BIDDING ON THE FOLLOWING BRANDED TERMS (Including Shopping Ads):
1) Relevant Branded terms (e.g. smartDOT)
Variations of the Branded Terms (i.e.: variations of branded terms examples (e.g. SMARTDOT, smartdot, smartDOT by Energy Dots, Energy Dots, smartDOT EMF, etc.) are also NOT ALLOWED.
No building branded FB pages that compete directly with the advertiser. ie - A branded FB page that uses the advertisers name
No use of the advertiser's brand name in URL (e.g. www.smartdotreviews.com, www.smartdotfans.com, etc.)
No GI email allowed. Only email traffic to TOP LEVEL and cable domains is allowed (e.g. Gmail, Yahoo, Cox, Time Warner, etc.)
NO brokering to any networks is allowed
**COMPLIANCE GUIDELINES** Do not say smartDOT prevents all forms of electro-stress. Do not say smartDOT blocks or shields radiation. Do not say smartDOT blocks or shields EMF. Can say smartDOT acts as a harmoniser. Can say smartDOT retunes EMF and thereby relieves symptoms of electro-stress. Can say smartDOT users report increased energy levels, fewer headaches, better sleep, better concentration, and a improved sense of calm. Can say smartDOT makes it more comfortable to use your cellphone and any device you are using. Can say smartDOT helps you keep a cool head (reference to medical thermal imaging research).
